caption: Table 1: Common symbols and their meanings in this paper.
description: This table lists the common symbols used throughout the paper along with their meanings.  It is a reference for readers to understand the notation used in equations and descriptions of the stepwise weighted spike coding scheme and ternary self-amplifying (TSA) neuron model.

caption: Table 2: Performance on CIFAR10 and ImageNet.
description: This table presents a comparison of the performance of different methods on the CIFAR-10 and ImageNet datasets.  It shows the accuracy and inference time (in coding steps and actual time) achieved by various approaches, including those using different architectures (ResNet, VGG, etc.).  The methods compared include several state-of-the-art ANN-SNN conversion techniques and directly trained SNNs. The table highlights the performance of the proposed SWS method in terms of its accuracy and the time it takes to perform inference, in comparison to existing methods.

caption: Table 2: Performance on CIFAR10 and ImageNet.
description: This table compares the performance of different methods (including the proposed SWS method) on CIFAR10 and ImageNet datasets.  It shows the architecture used, the number of time steps, the accuracy achieved by each method, and the difference in accuracy between the SNN model and its corresponding ANN model. The table allows a comparison of different methods' performance across various datasets with different network architectures.
